arts.ttl: Mellish: My debt of gratitude to Carlisle United
arts.sum: Jon Mellish has paid a heartfelt tribute to Carlisle United after leaving the Blues and said: I owe the club everything.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United's gap to safety increases on weather-hit weekend
arts.sum: Carlisle United's gap to safety increased to seven points - despite the weather laying waste to most of Saturday's League Two fixtures.

arts.ttl: Why Mellish, Carlisle United's Mr 110 per cent, will be missed
arts.sum: JON COLMAN: The defender, who has left the Blues for Wigan, never gave less than his all and was a better player than some liked to argue.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United sell defender Mellish to League One club
arts.sum: Carlisle United have sold defender Jon Mellish to League One club Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United announce signing of former Newcastle United defender Paul Dummett
arts.sum: CARLISLE United have announced the signing of former Newcastle United defender Paul Dummett on a short-term deal until the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United loanees Dominic Sadi and Dan Adu-Adjei recalled by Bournemouth
arts.sum: CARLISLE United have confirmed that Dominic Sadi and Dan Adu-Adjei have been recalled by their parent club Bournemouth AFC.

arts.ttl: Callum Whelan: 'I'm really desperate to succeed at Carlisle United'
arts.sum: INTERVIEW: The new signing talks about his move, and his route to Carlisle United via Manchester United, Oldham and Gateshead.

arts.ttl: Carlisle v MK Dons among games off due to freeze
arts.sum: Carlisle United's League Two fixture against MK Dons on Saturday is among the fixtures to be postponed due to freezing weather conditions.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United's clash with MK Dons postponed due to 'frozen' pitch
arts.sum: CARLISLE United's clash with MK Dons has been postponed due to the playing surface at Brunton Park being 'frozen', the club has confirmed.

arts.ttl: Cumbrian star with a 'high ceiling' who's set to face Carlisle United
arts.sum: Carlisle United boss Mike Williamson says MK Donsâ€™ Cumbrian Premier League loan star Joe White is a player of real potential.
